minecraft:scatter_feature.iterations: v.x = v.worldx; v.z = v.worldz; v.craterX = (math.floor(v.x/160) * 160) + 80; v.craterZ = (math.floor(v.z/160) * 160) + 80; v.o = q.noise(v.craterX, v.craterZ) * 0.25; v.px = v.craterX + v.o; v.pz = v.craterZ + v.o; v.rx = 0; v.rz = 0; v.p3x = math.mod(v.px*0.1031,1); v.p3y = math.mod(v.pz*0.1030,1); v.p3z = math.mod(v.px*0.0973,1); v.p3d = v.p3x*(v.p3y + 33.33) + v.p3y*(v.p3z + 33.33) + v.p3z*(v.p3x + 33.33); v.p3x = v.p3x + v.p3d; v.p3y = v.p3y + v.p3d; v.p3z = v.p3z + v.p3d; v.rx = math.mod((v.p3x + v.p3y)*v.p3z,1); v.rz = math.mod((v.p3x + v.p3z)*v.p3y,1); v.minSize = 8; v.maxSize = 12; v.size = 27 * v.rx; v.size = (v.size > v.minSize)? v.size: v.minSize; v.maxOffset = (160/2 - v.size); v.craterX = v.craterX + (v.rx * 2 - 1) * v.maxOffset; v.craterZ = v.craterZ + (v.rz * 2 - 1) * v.maxOffset; v.yCrater = 0; v.xDev = math.abs(v.craterX - v.x); v.zDev = math.abs(v.craterZ - v.z); (v.xDev * v.xDev + v.zDev * v.zDev < v.size * v.size) ? { v.xDev = v.xDev/v.size; v.zDev = v.zDev/v.size; v.sqrtY = v.xDev * v.xDev + v.zDev * v.zDev; v.yCrater = 5 - (v.sqrtY * v.sqrtY * 6); v.yCrater = (v.yCrater < 0) ? 0: v.yCrater; }; v.curAmplitude = 1; v.noise1 = 0; v.noise2 = 0; v.noise3 = (q.noise(0, 0) * v.curAmplitude - 0.1) * 4; v.i = v.x * 0.012500000186264515 / 4; v.j = v.z * 0.012500000186264515 / 4; v.i2 = -v.x * 0.014999999664723873 / 4; v.j2 = -v.z * 0.014999999664723873 / 4; loop(4, { v.noise1 = v.noise1 + q.noise(v.i, v.j) * v.curAmplitude; v.i = v.i * 2; v.j = v.j * 2; v.noise2 = v.noise2 + q.noise(v.i2, v.j2) * v.curAmplitude; v.i2 = v.i2 * 2; v.j2 = v.j2 * 2; v.curAmplitude = v.curAmplitude * 0.25; }); v.noise1 = v.noise1 * 8; v.noise2 = v.noise2 * 24; v.ydev = (v.noise3 < 0) ? v.noise1 : ((v.noise3 > 1) ? v.noise2 : (v.noise1 + (v.noise2 - v.noise1) * v.noise3)); t.height = (90 + v.ydev) - v.yCrater; t.layer = 89 > math.floor(t.height) ? math.floor(t.height) - 89 : 0; return 1;
